0: JUDGE RULES IN FAVOR OF GOTTAHAVEROCKANDROLL.COM IN LAWSUIT AGAINST MADONNA OVER THE AUCTION OF HER PERSONAL ITEMS INCLUDING TUPAC SHAKUR’S BREAK-UP LETTER NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR On Monday April 23, 2018, Manhattan Supreme Court Judge Gerald Lebovits ruled in favor of GottaHaveRockandRoll.com in its lawsuit against Madonna over the auction of her personal items including a breakup letter from rap legend Tupac Shakur. “We did substantial due diligence when we took all the Madonna items for auction. We were confident that Madonna had no claim whatsoever, and the judge clearly agreed with us,” said GottaHaveRockandRoll.com. Jeffrey Haas, attorney for GottaHaveRockandRoll.com added, “I
